title: Branco (Jo達o Soares)
body: In January 1906, the decree for his appointment as civil governor of Madeira was issued, and he took office on the 30th of that month and year. He was a deputy for Madeira in the legislative session from 1908 to 1910. In 1915, he published in Lisbon a 103-page pamphlet entitled A Nova Quest達o Hinton, which contains a collection of articles published in the newspaper O Paiz. He was a minister and a lecturer at the Army School. He passed away in Lisbon on February 4, 1927.

1906: Appointment as civil governor of Madeira
1915: Publication of the pamphlet A Nova Quest達o Hinton
